title: Bug 18915 - Switching between erroneous preferences pages generates a warning instead of an error
description: When users attempt to switch between preferences pages that contain errors, the system is currently displaying a warning. However, this behavior should be generating an error message instead.
OB: Currently, when users switch between preferences pages with errors, a warning is displayed.
EB: Bug 18915[Preferences] switching between erroneous preferences pages should generate an error message, not a warning.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application and navigate to the Preferences section.
2. Choose a preferences page that contains errors.
3. Try to switch to another preferences page within the same section.
